website_summaries.verdict: Boasting quality and support that's comparable to many pricier varieties, this affordable wrist brace offers excellent value for budget-conscious buyers.
pros: Dual rigid stays provide good support, reducing mobility for joint/tendon protection and pain relief
Made from antimicrobial fabric to combat odor-causing bacteria
cons: Sizes tend to run small and the thumb opening could be a little larger/more flexible

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t expecting much based on the last brand of wrist suppport I had bought. These are amazing. Basically eliminated the numbing of my fingers and the pain while bending one finger. Granted, they haven’t cured the carpal tunnel, but they’ve made it for a more comfortable day and night.
customer_reviews.author: cpakk

customer_reviews.title: The thumb-hole is too small and the liner is too large
customer_reviews.text: - The thumbhole is too small on these wrist braces -- it makes them uncomfortable to wear for longer than 30 minutes. - The liner on them is also too large, so it gets dragged through the holes the velcro-straps pass through. - The splits are nowhere near rigid enough for me + It is the right dimension around my wrist (I seem to have smaller wrists than hands, so a large would be too loose here) + I can put it on one-handed (you'd be surprised at how many assume you have two hands to thread velcro straps through and put the brace on)
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Letts

customer_reviews.title: Very sticky velcro
customer_reviews.text: Got the left and right for carpal tunnel. They are durable and helped, but the velco is so sticky (at first) that it hurt trying to pull it apart (remember i'm dealing with carpal tunnel)...after a few weeks of use, they kinda gum up the way velcro always does and they're easier to get on and off, but now, of course, they don't fasten as well. A good buy for the money, though, regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great brace at the right price
customer_reviews.text: My brace arrived fast and was just what I needed. It fits me well and is stiff enough to hold my wrist straight while I am working on my carvings.
customer_reviews.author: Dale C

customer_reviews.title: just what the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: I just received my brace but I have it on & I think it will be just what the doctor ordered. I have pseudogout in thumb & wrist. D octor suggested using a brace to keep wrist stabilized until pain goes away. this brace is easy to put on & the Velcro straps allow you to tighten it as much as needed. It is made of good material so it should wear well & is a breathable material to help with sweating.
customer_reviews.author: jaejae

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars!!!!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME!!!! I am so happy I purchased this brace. The adjustability has a wide range. I have a small wrist and it fits perfectly. My wrist is so much better! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Insufficient support
customer_reviews.text: First, they sent a right wrist brace. Then, they (and Amazon) sent the correct one. This brace has good support for the lower wrist but the ability to cinch across my hand is better with my Ace brace. Being able to tighten the brace higher on my hand allows for more support and greater relaxation. Additionally, the BraceUP brace straps constantly must be rethreaded into the opposite side, whereas the Ace straps are sewn with a flap to prevent that.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Do you know what the Dr's office charges for stuff like this
customer_reviews.text: I hurt my wrist lifting a transmission by myself lol I'm used to stuff like that going away on its own, it stopped hurting as much but if I moved it a certain way it would hurt. I like this brace because it limits the movements I make with my wrist, allowing to heal.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Thumb hole too small
customer_reviews.text: I've bought many wrist braces trying to find the one that works. This one works well, but like most, the issue is with the thumb hole. It's too small for my thumb making it uncomfortable after wearing it for a long time, and the end at the bottom of the hole gets shoved into my hand leaving a red mark for weeks. I had to make a extra layer of protection with scrap fabric to make it not leaflve marks or hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Walt Landon

customer_reviews.title: This Is the Support You've Been Searching For!
customer_reviews.text: Recently, after a car accident that left me with both wrists broken, I've ordered several wrist supports. This one, from BraceUP is one of the best. Fits perfectly (that is saying a lot as my wrists are super small) and is exactly as described. It's amazing to me how many support bands out there are not at all as they claim to be. This one works. And very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I play allot of pickle ball, this wrist brace protects my hand of any injury. I was worried that s/m would be too big, since I have a small wrist. It adjust to a perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Ed C

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. I sprained my wrist playing Volleyball but I still had to work and this Brace made it easier since it was smaller than other wrist braces to type on a keyboard. It also made it easier to write since I am right-handed. It wasn't perfect handwriting but it was legible. It also made it for a Fast recovery since I had a massive hematoma. Overall, it made performing my Job doable.
customer_reviews.author: Shareni

customer_reviews.title: just right
customer_reviews.text: this brace provides just the right amount of protection/support without being bulky or intrusive beyond the amount it needs to be to perform the function. It is not an immobilizing splint but is an effective reminder to "don't do that it will hurt". If I were to change anything, I would make the thumb opening slightly larger but the small fits my hand well and I am big boned and wear a size 9 ring.
customer_reviews.author: lol

customer_reviews.title: Great value, high quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality wrist support. I purchased a similar one in October and the Velcro straps have already worn out. I can tell that this one has superior straps and cost less. It fits perfectly and has excellent support.
customer_reviews.author: Don K

customer_reviews.title: Good design but thumb hole is uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall design with one exception, the thumb hole is round. This puts pressure on the base of my thumb. I think the thumb hole would be much more comfortable if it was oval shaped instead of being perfectly round. I’m unable to wear it for any length of time because my thumb starts hurting. Could be very nice if thumb hole was improved.
customer_reviews.author: Jim T.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Straps too long. Thumb hole too small.
customer_reviews.text: While I found the thumb hole too small on the large size I purchased, also also found that the lower strap was too long and did not have the Velcro in the right spot to be snug on my arm. I’m disappointed. It might be nice if you have chubby wrists and tiny hands.
customer_reviews.author: VJL

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love the adjustable fit. Makes this one of the most comfortable braces I have used. I have an old injury to my wrist that flares up sometimes. This brace fits well and allows my to do my computer work while giving my wrist the support it needs to not hurt. Best brace I have used to date, and I have had many over the years. Very happy with the purchase and the seller sent an e-mail to be sure I was 100% happy with my purchase! Fast delivery, great price!
customer_reviews.author: Moonminx

customer_reviews.title: Velcro does not adhere well!!!
customer_reviews.text: I want to like this product. I’m suffering postpartum carpal tunnel so I figured this brace would help. Unfortunately, my window for a return has passed, otherwise I would return it in a heartbeat. The biggest issue is that the straps won’t adhere to he Velcro well enough, so it always lifts at the ends and it has not only scratched me, but my baby as well. I can’t return it, but I’d say save your money and look for another brace because I do regret getting this and upset that I can’t return it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Chieng Li

customer_reviews.title: Best Wrist and Hand Support
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best support I have found. It is made for American size hands. I am 150 lbs, 5' 9" and medium boned. I have arthritis in my right hand. I purchased a LG/XL. Other supports were either too small (made for Chinese midgets) or went 1/2 way up my arm which was not needed nor desired. With this support, I feel no pain but have full use of my thumb and fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Good Support - Poor Comfort
customer_reviews.text: The brace design from a support standpoint is very good. Most light braces provide support on bottom of the wrist but not the top...this one stabilized really well with supports on both sides. The only (and fairly major) issue I have is the design of the thumb area. The border around the hole you put your thumb through is neither padded or flat, so it digs into the connective tissue between the thumb and index finger. I've started wearing a band-aid on that part of my hand to help when I'm wearing the brace but that's obviously not ideal. I ordered the L/XL, which I believe to be the correct size for my hand. Hopefully you'll have better luck.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: It's okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've used it for a little over a month now and it is not holding up very well. Since this is relatively cheap, I'm not surprised, but the longer I use it, the looser it gets. One of the grippers started fraying and curling up about week 2 of usage, as seen in the picture. Overall, not bad for the price but as soon as I get paid, I'm definitely throwing it away and getting a better one that I can use for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: rene machine

customer_reviews.title: Fits and works well!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for husband waiting for carpel tunnel surgery fit really good, the size fit his wrist hand good( he has wide hand).and helped him to not move wrist ,to aggravate workes well and he wore after while working to keep from forgetting and using it too soon!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than what you expect
customer_reviews.text: I'm an adult male and purchased the L/XL model for both my left and right wrists. The thumbs were tight, but I gave them a try. One night was all it took. I woke up with my tendons screaming at me and my thumbs (and the webbing) sore. The sheath felt nice, but I can't recommend these to anyone with average or larger hands. I ended up giving them to my wife, who has small hands... they fit her well.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Trudell Jr

customer_reviews.title: Not for large hands
customer_reviews.text: It is an effective brace for tendonitis. With the supports both under and over the wrist it stabilizes the wrist well. my complaint is that the thumb hole is too small. I have kind of large hands and it irritates the area between my thumb and forefinger. as a result I have to have the strap for that part of the splint loose. Overall the quality is quit good, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Kertamus

customer_reviews.title: Good brace that a good price
customer_reviews.text: I wear mine at work every single day where I am a cashier. Without the brace getting through the day was a struggle Due to pain in my rest. When I wear this at work it makes things a lot easier a lot better I can get through my shift and far less pain.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila &Keith Koch

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased both the large left and large right hand braces. They are wonderful. The left brace seems to run a tad bit smaller than the right, but the fit is correct for my hands. I use them to sleep in after a day of crafting, such as painting, crocheting, etc. When I use them they help keep my hands in the correct position during sleep and upon waking I find that I don't have any numbness or tingling in my hands, like I usually would after a day of work. I recommend the use of these for carpal tunnel relief. The brace support is not too rigid. The product is good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Barrow

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I use these for sleeping. Probably the best I have found as far as sweating is concerned. These do keep wrist from too much movement. I did return one the first time and I must say the company was GREAT to work with. I had a replacement in no time! I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good brace but not secure
customer_reviews.text: Brace has good support with the splint on both front and back. It’s an easy fit and comfortable. However, I gave it 3 stars b/c the 2 velcro are not strong enough to hold in place. The Velcro easily loses its grip and either gets tangled to itself or something else. I find myself re-securing the straps every few minutes throughout my day.
customer_reviews.author: anikko

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great. I can even sleep in it without feeling too constrained. I have small wrists but I tend to wake up in pain or feeling as if my blood is pooling when i wear other braces. I can even wear it on my other hand for short periods although it definitely doesn't fit as well. Should have got two. Only issue is the support seems to have a slight bend but I'm not sure if that's how it was designed or if it developed from days of work.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my wrist stable
customer_reviews.text: This brace does what its supposed to do - keeps my wrist in a neutral position. The only comment I would make is that I ordered the S/M and it is kind of tight to get on, though once it's on and secured, it is comfortable. I am a 70 year old woman with average sized wrists and hands, so I would say this brace runs small.
customer_reviews.author: CCP

customer_reviews.title: I've actually gotten to sleep through the night
customer_reviews.text: For the past year I've been working as a maid and my carpal tunnel symptoms have only gotten worse. I wasn't sure just wearing a wrist brace would help me sleep through the night without being woken by my arm/wrist aching, but this has worked. I've had the brace for a few weeks now and I can't remember a night where I've woken up because of my carpal tunnel. It's great. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Hurts my hand
customer_reviews.text: I wore it for work when I carry heavy stuff. The first time I wore it, it hurt around my extensor digitorum tendons (if I'm correct) area. Image e a hard metal pushing against your hand whenever you try to move your hand upwards. Maybe its because I have a small hand. I'm a female Asian, 5'3", around 128 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: ijoe

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 Stars. Great product for the price.  $30+ at a store
customer_reviews.text: I am using it for a wrist injury to prevent my hand from bending to far forwards or backwards and although my injury has not improved, the brace is doing its job very well. Its a great brace that you can easily put on one handed. My only issue is the seam between the thumb and pointer finger really chafes after prolonged wearing. I put in a make shift cotton pillow to fix this and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: David Meservey

customer_reviews.title: Feels great on
customer_reviews.text: The brace fits well and feels great on. The hand is nice and secure in position. My only complaint is the package came all beat up and ripped.
customer_reviews.author: mmk

customer_reviews.title: Not just for carpal tunnel!
customer_reviews.text: I use a wheeled walker everyday and my wrists felt like perhaps I had a stress fracture. I have used these before when I had been diagnosed with carpal tunnel so I would give them a shot again. I wear them at night when I sleeps and they seem to have alienated the weakness/pain I had been feeling.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: No more flipping and flopping with this brace!
customer_reviews.text: I received a hand injury back in January and this brace has been a life saver! It has definitely helped me be able to use my left hand without my wrist flopping around so I've been grateful for that!
customer_reviews.author: sparKlysole

customer_reviews.title: It has supports on the front and back that really keep my wrist stable
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. It's not bulky so I can wear it under long sleeve tops. It's also light weight and comfortable to wear all night. I wish I had purchased this when I first sprained my wrist. I was given a compression wrap and it was not enough support.
customer_reviews.author: Gailff

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not great
customer_reviews.text: Good material but to tight in the thumb hole for a large. To be perfect the palm support would be a little longer with more of a curve, and the space for thump would not dig in were your thumb meets your palm.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T. Doherty

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic. I sleep with them and work about half ...
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. I sleep with them and work about half my day with them. I was really upset to lose the really nice pair I had which I’d received from my ortho years back, and so put off for too long buying others hoping I’d find my other pair + other wrist braces lost as well. These are just perfect though. I wish I’d ordered sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Granere

customer_reviews.title: fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love this brace for my carpal tunnel in my right hand. It is lightweight, not cumbersome at all, fits my hand perfectly. I do not realize I have it on it is so light. And if I sweat, it doesn't bother me. When I wear it the pain goes away in my hand. I'm going to buy another one for my left hand as I also have carpal tunnel in my left hand. My carpal tunnel is so bad I need to have surgery on my right hand first.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Works, but ACE brand is better
customer_reviews.text: Works okay, but it takes a bit of fiddling to get them on, because the straps come out of the holes and have to be rethreaded (or else you have to take extreme care when putting them on). The ACE brand goes on and off much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bluejay

customer_reviews.title: Metal digs into top of hand
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that there is metal on the top & bottom in this brace. I've been wearing it & every time I move my hand up the metal digs into the top of my hand. It's not comfortable at all & as cause more pain in my hand than my wrist was giving me.
customer_reviews.author: Midnite7X

customer_reviews.title: This is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I Slept with my hand all curled up. In the middle of the night I woke up in pain. This has allowed me to sleep through the night. brace is even comfortable to wear in the day.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Thankful for This Brace
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got carpal tunnel in my right wrist and it caused me pain when trying to use that hand while exercising. Holding weights, doing push-ups or plank or yes, even using my phone caused pain that lasted for hours. But with the brace I can do nearly everything pain free.
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaJoy

customer_reviews.title: Support was great for price, but material is rough and gave me a blister
customer_reviews.text: It felt like really great quality and seemed like great support for the price out of the box. However, after wearing it for 2 hours, the material caused chafing and a blister on the web of my thumb. I work in an office and have tried several of these. I will stick to my futuro brand which is soft and gentle on my skin and comfortable for all-day wear if i need. I returned it and bought a Futuro wrist brace instead.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Tam

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These braces fit nicely and would be great for occasional use. I need them while sleeping so after about a month of using them every night they no longer stay closed and really don't do me any good. They are not made for daily use in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Todd & Marcee Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Price good but not for long term use
customer_reviews.text: Has a nice soft piece that goes between thumb and first finger which decreases abrasion. Sizing is good. Weak point is the velcro dtrdps and how long they maintain grip. The ends of the straps do it hold up well
customer_reviews.author: Peace/Skol

customer_reviews.title: Effective brace. Wishthereweremore color choices.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gotten this and a couple other types for carpal tunnel. This one is bulkier, but definitely does the job best. My only complaint is the lack of color options.
customer_reviews.author: S. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to keep my wrist stable when the carpal tunnel is irritated. It works better than my previous wrist braces. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Eva J. Burns

customer_reviews.title: It does make the wrist feel better but the adjustable strap sometimes does not stay in ...
customer_reviews.text: It does make the wrist feel better but the adjustable strap sometimes does not stay in place. It also has a chemical odor that means I am going to have to wash it before using it for prolong periods
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: The area around the thumb is very irritating and I just wish they had a larger size or at least make the area around thumb more comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Even L/XL was small for my hand. The area around the thumb is very irritating and I just wish they had a larger size or at least make the area around thumb more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dejan

customer_reviews.title: It ripped in less than a month!
customer_reviews.text: I am very upset about this purchase! It ripped apart! I will definitely not recommend this item! Very frustrating since I need to wear a brace on a daily basis! Now I am having to search for a new one. It lasted me exactly 3 weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: I really like this brace
customer_reviews.text: I really like this brace, it's comfortable and I like the hard part inside is a hard plastic vs a metal bar. My only complaint is, after using this for 5 or 6 weeks, I'm realizing the Velcro doesn't seem to stick too good anymore. I am resticking the Velcro several times a day. Other than the velcro, I love this brace!
customer_reviews.author: Diane34

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: The Velcro fasteners catch on EVERYTHING. If you wear long sleeves, or even walk past and graze something that can stick to Velcro, it will. Really irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: It's comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many braces... this is the most light weight and comfortable and flexible (where needed) brace I have. You can still use your fingers while having the support on your wrist... I just ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Felt twisted
customer_reviews.text: Very strange fit. Felt like it was twisted and I couldn’t relax my wrist/hand. Won’t work for nightly wear with carpal tunnel. May work to correct shape but the discomfort was too bothersome at night.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: Short Straps
customer_reviews.text: The support is very good. However, the straps are too short and start to curl up and separate from the velcro. Have had to add an additional piece of velcro around my entire wrist to keep the brace from loosening.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Puliselic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Me
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had them 5 months. Where a left and right every night. Perfect support fir my wrists. As a fuller figure gal, they fit great. Offer support without being too high or low. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy L. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: They don’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Not very impressed. I realize my hands are very large, I have a hard time finding gloves that fit but I had to cut the thumbs open all the way and now the elastic straps are stretched and the Velcro ends don’t hold overnight. I will say they do help with my issue but now I’m looking at finding a new set of braces. Returning them is not an option I am sure as I have cut them to use them but only a week or two of use?
customer_reviews.author: Jlcdhazzard

customer_reviews.title: Helps with CT but Velcro is no good
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helps with my carpal tunnel but the Velcro on this brace is crap. It comes undone or loosens frequently while wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew&Bridget Murray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit left hand brace
customer_reviews.text: I bought both left and right wrists braces and I just love them. Over the years, I have purchased several types of wrist braces and the biggest problem is always in selecting the proper size. Your size chart was best I have ever seen. The braves fit perfectly. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Eidman

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: It's tiny enough to be very wearable, without being cumbersome, but still strong enough to be good support. The straps can pull it very tight and are positioned so that it is easy to adjust. Having had bulky, uncomfortable models before, I am very pleased with this one!
customer_reviews.author: mary aschenberg

customer_reviews.title: Really helps with my carpal tunnel.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes my carpal tunnel is so bad, I find it difficult to sleep. This brace has really helped me on these occasions and I sleep like a new born.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne S.

customer_reviews.title: valcro tape very weak
customer_reviews.text: unstraps itself very quickly. Poor finish, a threads coming out. But worked well for a week or so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as supportive as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.text: It does not give enough compression to feel supportive for me. Also, the velcro straps do not hold up over time. They eventually curl out which makes them less likley to stay 'velcroed.'
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heal faster
customer_reviews.text: Needed wrist support for injury and it works excellent. Firm, adjustable support, easy on and off. A must to recover from a wrist injury! Due to the swelling in my hand/wrist, the thumb hole was a tad snug but was ok. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Craig A Schilperoort

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: I ordered both the left and right wrist splints due to fears of developing carpal tunnel. The braces do a good job of immobilizing the wrist as long as you tighten them properly. They have helped to relieve numbness and tingling in my hand and fingers. Would definitely recommend for anyone concerned with developing CTS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meets my needs
customer_reviews.text: I had suffered a bad fall and sprained both wrists. This alleviated to pain and helped me heal. It was even comfortable enough to sleep in.
customer_reviews.author: A.c.

customer_reviews.title: It is a good price and I like the fact there is a ...
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you buy the right size. I got the L/XL but it was way too big and the velcro straps get catching onto my clothing. It is a good price and I like the fact there is a splint on BOTH the top and bottom of your hand to hold it in place.
customer_reviews.author: hchou

customer_reviews.title: Good when new
customer_reviews.text: The stitching around the plastic braces are very thin. After a couple months the threading holding the brace has ripped and the brace is no longer secure inside. The velcro has lost it's stickiness (not the correct word, but you get it).
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: This is meh. I wore it for a few days but it cuts off the thumb to an unbearable degree. I sprung for a nicer one at Norco.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Fits great.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this for a couple days now & it's helped with the pain. Fits well, doesn't irritate my skin. Glad I chose it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Good overall but slight discomfort
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the small/medium size. I wear xs gloves for reference. Product is nice, however, the skin between my thumb and pointer finger is red and sore in the morning because the brace puts a lot of pressure there.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda D'Addario

customer_reviews.title: Good brace, but caused a blister with overnight use.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well to ease carpal tunnel nerve pain, but something in the brace between the thumb and index finger caused a blister with two days of overnight use, so I discontinued using it.
customer_reviews.author: R Willden

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Too much time holding a mouse gets to my wrist at times so I bought this. It's adjustable, comfy, supports and immobilizes my wrist so it can rest.
customer_reviews.author: CaliGal

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This product was just what I was looking for. Perfect fit and nice wrist support with enough freedom for my fingers to still type. I was concerned after reading reviews about the thumb hole being tight, but mine is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle G.

customer_reviews.title: Helps my carpal tunnel so much
customer_reviews.text: I wear the left brace and the right brace for my carpal tunnel syndrome and before I bought these I couldn't sleep at night, I would wake up throughout the night in pain. Now that I have the braces on my wrists I can sleep at night and I'm no longer waking up in the middle up of the night with severe hand cramps. I even wear them during the day and they aren't that bad to wear it just takes time to get used to them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even the Small size is a litle big
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this brace but the fit is a little bit big. I purchased the small and the velcro barely connects. The tabs hang over and collect fuzzies and clothing. I do have smaller wrists but not unusually small. I will probably end up getting some veclro tabs or something for a more solid fit. Otherwise, it has give me very good support and served its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Mary W.

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I had read some comments about the thumb opening being too small, and although it is smaller then my other wrist splints thumb opening, I personally like it better. This splint fits nicely, and I’ve actually switched it to use in the opposite hand on occasion. It seems pretty universal to me.
customer_reviews.author: morinmoments

customer_reviews.title: Great value, for 6 days... Updated review.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Limits mobility. Prevents wrist from entering painful position. Today is day 7 of using this brace and it's velcro is wearing and the support has broken free of the top knuckle side. I am perturbed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mascaro

customer_reviews.title: Velcro is ok, not great.
customer_reviews.text: I like the support of it. Support on top and on the bottom. I dislike the Velcro straps! They do not stay after several uses especially if you are on the smaller side of the wrist. Wish the Velcro was different.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Thumbhole too tight.
customer_reviews.text: Thumb hole is way too small. I have small wrists & it fits otherwise. Tried stretching thumbhole & still too uncomfortable because it cuts into my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Hood

customer_reviews.title: Carpel tunnel helps
customer_reviews.text: Velcro last about 2 years of using every night. But they are confortable. This is our 3rd pair we buy. In 7 years
customer_reviews.author: Milca Nieves

customer_reviews.title: Great wrist support
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Purchased this for my 92 year-old Dad w/carpal tunnel syndrome & numbness to fingers. He likes it a lot & s/m fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki  Lafreniere

customer_reviews.title: Difficult
customer_reviews.text: Bought it after a stroke. Found it very difficult to put it on with one hand. Functions in hand coming back without it
customer_reviews.author: John D. Sims

customer_reviews.title: It works for what you need it for.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and got the Klein done. Kept me from buying an expensive one that does the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Toosweet

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy,,comfortable well worth the price. Best brace I've ever worn!
customer_reviews.text: I shattered my wrist. When my orthopedic doctor repaired it, he also found a carpal tunnel problem as well. I have worn many braces over the years due to arthritic wrists. This one is the best by far. I purchased one for both my right and a left hand. The steel shank makes it extra sturdy for me. If you don't need it, just remove. I have really small wrists,and the S/M fit me perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Lagerflams

customer_reviews.title: It helps with “ tingling”
customer_reviews.text: I have been feeling tingling in my forearm and goes to my fingers off and on throughout the day. I ordered the small / medium brace... it has helped so much.its not big and bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Hate Shopping

customer_reviews.title: Hurts my thumb
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice looking, supportive brace, but one edge has a sharp bit that irritates my wrist, and the thumb opening digs in, around my thumb, makes dents, and is painful. It's hard to imagine this fitting anyone with an extra-large wrist or hand.
customer_reviews.author: Karsu

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one at Walmart but it was a large. kept coming off in the night. Ordered the small/med and it is a much better fit!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: No drugs no doctors and relief!
customer_reviews.text: Whenever my carpel tunnel flares up I just wear this for a few days and it goes away!!! No drugs. No doctors!
customer_reviews.author: Ezralite

customer_reviews.title: Velcro fasteners not adequate
customer_reviews.text: Product works to prevent most numbness but after about a month velcro strips bend back and don't stick well enough...have tendency to stick to other bed clothes. Am looking for better guards.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Handy

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a good product
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good product that fits the purpose. I feel less nerve pain with the brace that without it. I truly recommend for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Wrist Brace
customer_reviews.text: I have tendonitis and this brace allows me to pick up items without pain.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: This product has helped me sleep thru the night. ...
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped me sleep thru the night. It keeps my wrist stable throughout the day and at night. It was delivered quick and it's made very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Return customer.
customer_reviews.text: Just the right amount of support with just a little give if needed. So much better than the metal stays & not too long. Washes well if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kim  Boychuk

customer_reviews.title: It's a very good product. The only problem I had was the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good product. The only problem I had was the size. Originally I ordered size S/M (2, one for each hand) but they turned out to be too tight and I don't have big hands. I returned them and got 2 more, L/XL this time and these ones are doing the job.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Babeton-Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have said, the thumb opening on this brace is small, and rubs uncomfortably in both the webbing between your thumb and pointer finger and at the base of the thumb. It does the job, but I can only wear it for short periods of time. Adding moleskin around the thumb opening did alleviate the problem a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Megan K. Duffie

customer_reviews.title: It's A Wrap
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice small, yet sturdy wrap. Occasionally I need to support my wrist for a few hours. This brace is not cumbersome. It's perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Painful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have RA and have been using a more expensive version that I wanted multiples of. I found the over the hand top brace painful.
customer_reviews.author: Amie Gribbins

product_meta.title: BraceUP® Wrist Support Brace with Splints for Carpal Tunnel Arthritis - Left Wrist (S/M)
feature_bullets: Two Splints provide high level of wrist support
Breathable materials release excess heat and moisture

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
